title: When Someone Counter Picks your Champion in Ranked ...
body:
http://i2.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/001/074/811/274.gif

But then as the match goes on, you start noticing how they're struggling against you.

http://i2.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/001/072/185/c72.gif

Then you realize they're not entirely familiar with the champion, so you take advantage of this factor.

http://i0.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/001/074/703/726.gif

At the end, you win the game and dominated your lane. You say "gg" to your rival but with a devious smile.

http://i2.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/001/073/772/925.gif

replies.body: i tried so many times to counter pick my enemies, and then i realised it means nothing if i can't fucking play the champion! .....{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
{{champion:222}} is easy as hell to play

They're using the image as an expression, I doubt they're using Jinx as a specific example. Also, if you haven't played a champion at least once before, it is likely going to be difficult for the first and second match to get used to how they work and synergize with other champions.
I'm... pretty sure it was a joke guys.

Besides, there aren't that many difficult-to-learn ADCs. Jinx isn't exactly {{champion:21}} when it comes to ease-of-use, I'd put her somewhere in the middle. The ones that are particularly difficult, you don't really see that often. I'm referring pretty much to {{champion:119}} , {{champion:96}} , {{champion:67}} , and maybe {{champion:236}}, because I see a ton of bad Lucians.
Wait, how do i right click again?  I ult them at point blank, full HP right?
Donger is the only mid laner i can counter with. And apart from that, even when im the one countered, i play pretty damn well XD.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

Yeah, but then I get determined to learn that champion for the sole reason that I keep seeing the other champion a ton.

Which is why all that {{champion:72}} is paying off super-nicely with everyone picking {{champion:64}} {{champion:24}} {{champion:11}} {{champion:203}} {{champion:107}} {{champion:5}}, and of course, {{champion:104}}.

I like all 20 of my rank-5 champs equally. They all have a place. Even if I'm picking {{champion:30}} and {{champion:72}} the vast majority of the time. {{champion:119}} and {{champion:78}} if I'm in the mood for something besides mid/jungle.

Hey this is rather unrelated to the topic(sorry op) but could you give me any tips on versing Zed as Lux? He's the one champion I struggle against when playing Lux, so any advice would be super awesome!:)

1. Start Cloth+4 and start building into {{item:3191}}.  Your gonna be short on mana since your E costs an arm and a leg, so don't spam spells early on.

2. Avoid his WEQ combo as best you can and save your Q once he hits 6.  

3. Put a pink in the bush in the river to watch for enemy jungle as well as helping your other lanes for when Zed tries to roam.  

4. NEVER follow Zed when he roams.  That's just asking for him to all in you.

5. Most importantly of all, spam laugh whenever you kill Zed to show him who's boss.

> [{quoted}](name=Skoonie,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=br0Egg4y,comment-id=000400000000,timestamp=2016-02-06T12:38:53.465+0000)
>
> 1. Start Cloth+4 and start building into {{item:3191}}.  Your gonna be short on mana since your E costs an arm and a leg, so don't spam spells early on.
> 
> 2. Avoid his WEQ combo as best you can and save your Q once he hits 6.  
> 
> 3. Put a pink in the bush in the river to watch for enemy jungle as well as helping your other lanes for when Zed tries to roam.  
> 
> 4. NEVER follow Zed when he roams.  That's just asking for him to all in you.
> 
> 5. Most importantly of all, spam laugh whenever you kill Zed to show him who's boss.

Update: This has been a life saver...recently got first blood on a Zed and then double kill(I flashed into my turret when enemy yi alpha striked and then binded him:P) only because I was able to take so much less damage due to the cloth armor and the 4 hp pots helped a lot too! Thanks so much, you're a legend!:)

Glad I could be of help!

Thanks so much! Ctrl 4 until ragequit eh xD
Statistically, even if he was a good Zed you'd still most likely win the game.
two years ago i went {{champion:105}}  mid against a {{champion:131}}  and went 16/0 in that ranked game
I woulda thought Diana would beat Fizz as she counters most assassins.
she is a counter

Last month, I faced three people whom tried to counter me when I went {{champion:75}} top.

Faced a {{champion:122}}, {{champion:80}}, and {{champion:68}} whom were picked right after I picked first.
But the difference was, I went Nasus top because i'm very familiar with him, what builds are required to survive certain match ups, and used him countless times where I can escape ganks or turn it into a double kill. These players, although skillful- only chose these champions to have an 'easy' time to shut me down early and thought that's all they needed to do by picking said champion.

Suddenly i'm 11 / 3 or 9 / 0 by the end of the game, because they didn't know how to handle a well farmed Nasus. By the time a gank does happen, it's usually too late and I either scare em off or get a kill (hardly died to any of those since I was over 400 stacks).

So yea, i'd much rather play a champion I knew than risk by simply picking a counter champion I hardly use just for the sake of countering.

When I'm Nasus and Teemo doesn't know how to utilized blind dart on me.
http://orig13.deviantart.net/cae0/f/2015/164/d/d/smash__bruce_banner_x_reader__by_anna_lyn-d8x3yy0.jpg

When I'm {{champion:14}} vs Riven 
https://media4.giphy.com/media/nGX0uxigecYr6/giphy.gif
#EveryCaitPlayerEver
exactly counterpicking is desperate and stupid just play what you can actually play and who you actually know seriously

When you're jungler says they won't gank because you picked an easily counterable champion, then ragequits 20 minutes later while you're 3/1/3, because their afk farming tactics (shocker) don't turn out so well for other lanes.

ugh...

Champ select:

{{champion:11}} I googled you. You have no ranked games as her.
{{champion:11}} See, they picked a fizz. Thanks a lot. Not ganking you.
{{champion:55}} You're a Yi. That's a given.
(silence)

**Their Backdoorer** {{champion:23}} backdoors top relentlessly with Yi nearby, with map awareness inversely proportional to number of goggles. Then Trynd backdoors MID while I'm ganking bot.
**Our Backdoorer** {{champion:11}}, in top river, sees Trynd on mid tower... and goes for herald. Then goes top, pushes with no vision, and then dies to 2-man gank once he reaches top tower, then afk's.

Hey, here's a quick tip people. You can Google? Google "what am I doing wrong?" instead of "reasons to bitch at randos" and you MIGHT actually make some progress in your League endeavors.
Rekt a Garen as Akali a long long time ago. His teammates wanted to report him because apparently, in champ select, he said this lane would be easy. I guess he didn't specify for whom.
Is the tomato gif from that one shows about Catholic Vegetables?

Yep. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/VeggieTales

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
